code: import{applyMiddleware,createStore}from"redux";import{composeWithDevTools,devToolsEnhancer}from"redux-devtools-extension";import rootRreducer from"./reducer";import{persistStore,persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import logger from"redux-logger";import thunk from"redux-thunk";var middleWares=[logger,thunk];var persistConfig={key:"token",storage:storage,whitelist:["token"]};var rootMiddleWares=applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleWares);var compose=composeWithDevTools(rootMiddleWares);var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootRreducer);export var store=createStore(persistedReducer,compose);export var persistor=persistStore(store);
